title: How to Open an ETE File

steps.title: Download and install Vumingo Exam Test Engine.
steps.content: Download and install Vumingo Exam Test Engine. You can download a demo of Vumingo's Exam Test Engine , but it will only let you view the first five questions in the ETE file. In order to view an ETE file in full, you'll need to purchase a subscription to Vumingo's software. Vumingo has two options: lite and full. The lite option has the ability to open ETE files, and costs anywhere from $119.99 (billed quarterly) to $749.99 (billed every 2 years). [1] X Research source When installing Vumingo, choose to install just the ETE Player if given the option.

steps.title: Sign in to Vumingo.
steps.content: Sign in to Vumingo. Once you have Vumingo installed and have paid for a subscription, you can open Vumingo and sign in. If you don't have a valid subscription, the Vumingo app won't let you sign in.

steps.title: Open your ETE file.
steps.content: Open your ETE file. Any ETE file on your computer should automatically open in Vumingo. If it doesn't, you can right-click the file and select Open withâ€¦ then select Vumingo. Use the Vumingo interface to select how many questions you want in your test, or click the Take All Questions button in the upper-left corner of the window to go through all the test questions.
